document_name: Strengthening Capacity fo Evidence BAsed Analytical Studies _ProDoc.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/UGA/00063265/Strengthening Capacity fo Evidence BAsed Analytical Studies _ProDoc.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: Technical Capacity of EDPR to carry out evidence-based analytical studies strengthened
Output 2: Evidence-based Analytical Studies for informing policy carried out by EDPR ( Economic Development, Economic Development Policy and Research)
Output 3: Evidence-based analytical study findings disseminated to the policy makers, other key stakeholders and the general public

project_descr: Enhancing the capacity of national and local institutions in Uganda to conduct evidence-based analytical studies that inform the formulation of pro-poor policies which promote human development and the attainment of the MDGs in Uganda.
project_title: CAPACITY FOR EVIDENCE BASED ANALYTICAL STUDIES
